DjinnLamp.synopsis: Player interacts with an oil lamp in the tavern. They find it is just an ordinary lamp - no magic happens.

TeleporterHole_Tiny.synopsis: Player's AD feedback about not able to go through a TINY teleporter hole.
TeleporterHole_Tiny.how_to_trigger: Don't have WEIGHT_TINY  tag on your character.Find a TeleporterHole which filters on WEIGHT_TINY tag.Click it.

Crate_Wood_Open_Interact.synopsis: A response that occurs when a player clicks on an empty crate. These crates can be moved and picked up, but have no other purpose.

TeleporterHole_Small.synopsis: Player's AD feedback about not able to go through a SMALL teleporter hole.
TeleporterHole_Small.how_to_trigger: Don't have WEIGHT_SMALL tag on your character.Find a TeleporterHole which filters on WEIGHT_SMALL tag.Click it.

PartyCommentsAfterShortRest.synopsis: Whenever the party takes a short rest one member will give the player a feedback in form of these comments.

NotEnoughApprovalForCRD.synopsis: The companion is addressed while in camp, and while having a CRD that has an approval minimum, while the player trying to start the dialogue does not have enough approval.

SawDoppelgangerFirstTime.synopsis: Voicebark happens when you see for the first time a shapeshifter transfroming into their natural form.

CombatReact_PartyDeath.synopsis: A combat voice bark.When:- party member dies (HP reaches 0)- there is a highest relationship companion/avatar nearby in same combatThat relationship bond character would say this VB.NOTE: SECOND SPEAKER IS DEAD. ONLY ADDED FOR TAG CHECKS
CombatReact_PartyDeath.how_to_trigger: Have strong relationship between characters.Enter any combat.Have one of the partners die.

DjinnLamp_0.speaker: Player
DjinnLamp_0.text: An ordinary lamp. Not a trace of magic on it.

TeleporterHole_Tiny_0.speaker: Narrator
TeleporterHole_Tiny_0.text: *A tight fit for even the smallest of creatures, let alone you.*

TeleporterHole_Small_0.speaker: Player
TeleporterHole_Small_0.text: Not a chance I'll fit in there.

TeleporterHole_Small_1.speaker: Narrator
TeleporterHole_Small_1.text: *Whatever secrets lie beyond this opening will be for someone smaller to discover.*

NotEnoughApprovalForCRD_0.speaker: Player
NotEnoughApprovalForCRD_0.text: Do not speak to me or my hamster.

SawDoppelgangerFirstTime_0.speaker: Player
SawDoppelgangerFirstTime_0.text: What in the hells? It was a shape shifter!

CombatReact_PartyDeath_1.context: NodeContext: in combat, a companion you're very close to has just died
